content.detailedDescription: It was a flying sourcer
content.summary: it's a foggy morning in kenya, muranga county, me and a friend are driving down a murram road video tapping the heavy fog that is falling making it hard to drive. its terrible weather for us but not for this ufo that took the chance to fly by unnoticed.

content.detailedDescription:
On september 23rd of 2013, at 10:00 pm i was witnessing uncountable amount of lights turned on in sky and turned off immediately. from our balcony i had a very open view to the city and i believe what i witness could be seen by too many others as well. aftre less than 2 min again these lights in the sky turned on and off. as i remembered i happened 3 times within 2-3 minutes. 

later on at 10:30 pm, i went downstairs to pick up a dear friend of ours into the apartment and 2-3 more times the lights in the sky turned on and off and this time i believe my friend could see it as well.  it started to rain at the same time as well, so i imagine lots of people would not look up in the sky while it rains. there was no sound and it was not like lightning which to my understanding tracks of it, is from top to down, the lights i saw in the sky seemd to spread in the same level and looked like it is all over the whole city.

about 12:30 or 1 a.M same night againg flashes( it looked like these lights turn on then turn off, again turn on, less than a second turn off again. this time i believe it was the longest time it was on and could be even 1-2 second).

 feeling wise, it was so big and huge and unbeleivable that till even today, except very few people, i can not talk about it. 

during of the very few seconds of witnessing what i saw, there were couple of things my mind was occupied that if what i am seeing, other people would see it too, they would go nuts. i went nut my self! and the other thing is that when you see those lights, all believes and religious and science and engineering or any other  things you have as a concept needs to change!
content.summary: Lights in sky which turned on and off

content.detailedDescription: Drivong home from work late night after putting gas in my car im driving down flagler streetand before i reach 57th avenue i see falling from sky a huge bluish/white ball of light. it was half the size of the moon the way it looked tonight. can't be meteor, i've seen falling stars. this was too big, i was scared that i thought it was some sort of spherical missile about to blow up miami. afterwards heard helicopters in sky.
content.summary: Driving home late night saw huge ball falling from sky. can't be meteor, i've seen falling stars. this was too big, i was scared that i thought it was some sort of spherical missile about to blow up miami. afterwards heard helicopters in sky.

content.detailedDescription:
I was at the warehouse store in burlington, wa, by the gas pumps, just parked my car.  i was checking out my camera on my samsung note 4 and i was going to drop the phone and when i went to save it, i accidentally pressed the picture shooter and the camera began taking continuous shots, multiple shots per second.

when i was done shopping, and arrived home, i started looking at the photos and realized that one had what looked like it had a funnel that  appeared in the sky (which now i think is a portal) and/or sonic boom; the next photo shows the funnel reduced to a round pathway and an orb shooting through. the following photo shows the orb travelling, as well as the following photo.  then it looks like a ring develops around the orb.  finally the orb continues on and disappears.

at first i thought it was a cloud (the first photo), but as i zoomed in to the far right, it was obviously a formation of a some sort.

i knew what the object was because i have read and seen photos of it.  i also know that many think that orbs are just weather balloons or satellites.  i think that these photos tell a different story.  the object looks like it came through a portal that opened up and immediate closed as the object shot through and began to travel.

these photos were taken slightly over a second as it was a rapid photo shoot.  these were captured by accident.

i am not convinced that it is a weather balloon.  i would like to know what it really is.
content.summary: A portal suddenly opens in the sky and an orb suddenly ejects from the opening and appears in the sky.

content.detailedDescription: Just before dusk i was viewing satellites using my 15x70 binoculars in my back yard when into my field of view from the east was an object lower then the orbiting satellites.  refocused binoculars for the suborbital object (maybe at somewhere around 100k feet) straight overhead.  this was a pure black triangle, at each of the 3 points a red light would appear to flash (all 3 together) then the object would accelerate rapidity.   this happened about 4 times before the object was approaching the western horizon and out of my view.  without the binoculars none of the craft or red lights flashes were visible.  one might even say that it was possibly igniting fuel during each red burst, but the acceleration jump must of been so great that i suspect the inertia was dampened or possibly a unmanned craft.
content.summary: Black triangle suborbital

content.detailedDescription: This must me my 4th report, i always see the orbs and they respond back, this time they took long before they flew off, they responded with 4x flash everytime i turn my laser on, from the past they only do it 1-2x but now they did it 4x and the last 5sec they stoped before the last flash they light started fading.
content.summary: This time they flashed me 4x responding to laser light

content.detailedDescription:
My husband and i had noticed in the past few months some, "stars" that caught our attn. we had never given any thought to ufo's, or anything remotely associated with one. when we would go outside to smoke, we would randomly look up, and notice that some of the stars were flashing, (from white, to red, to blue, and sometimes yellow. and never in any particular pattern) sometimes randomly moving, (almost like circular squiggles). not darting by any means, but still noticeable if you paid attention. 

it had become our thing to do ever since the weather has warmed up,while we went outside to smoke. light up, just kind of glance up, notice which ones were brighter, etc. my husband even shone his phone's flashlight at one once. (the one we were watching had started blinking, and he figured why not.) 

well, about an hour ago, i stepped out onto our enclosed porch. (it's got windows on 3 sides, so i can see quite a bit). i light up my cigarette, look up, as has been the pattern lately, not really thinking too much about it. when i look off to my right, and see one of the "weird stars". it made me uncomfortable, but, i always told myself, "oh c'mon, stop letting some stupid star scare you." well, i see it start to move around slightly, and figure i'd aim my phone at it to take a video. (iphone 6s) so i aim it in the general direction of the star i'm curious about, and notice there's like 4-5 smaller, less bright ones on it's left. i hit record, and then it happened a few seconds later. i still don't know what the heck happened, but very suddenly, a bright beam shot straight out of one of the smaller stars into my porch. (believe me, i so understand how idiotic this sounds, and i likely wouldn't believe this if it hadn't just happened.) the light scared the crap out of me, and i jumped. i clicked the video off and ran in to get my husband. i showed him the stars, the video, and he too was like, "what the â‚¬%?@??"   i don't know what happened, or what i saw. but, i do know for sure that i'm scared and do not ever want to look outside any more!  i'm freaking out, and im literally too scared to go outside now. this is not normal!
content.summary: I was out on my porch, had my phone pointed at the "star" and all the sudden, a very bright light shot straight at me.

content.detailedDescription: No
content.summary: All this just to submit a video. i feel like i should just post it on youtube.

content.detailedDescription:
I see realy ufo or unknown object with hispeed and with spin light
orange yellow green...
bright
stunning
with special sound and hispeed
so not spy or built by human we think is ufo orunknown obeject see
content.summary: I see realy ufo or unknown object with hispeed and

content.detailedDescription: I was outside on my 3rd story deck at 10pm when i saw a unusually fast white lighted object flying very fast to the north east much fast than the planes and then it just disappeared  it lasted approximately 1 minutes or less to go from the far south to the mid north from my location about 2 minutes after there were 3 planes flying the same height in the sky but they all were flashing and much slower than the object i saw as i was looking to the north east u noticed what i thought was a bright star in the sky and all of the sudden it just disappear i kept watching to see if it would reappear but it didn't  it is a very clear night so u can see all the stars i continued to watch the planes heading in the north east area and it took them much longer to get across the sky i would guess 4 minutes from the south to the north and they never disappeared as they would if they had ran into some cloud cover or something i don't know what they were but i felt compelled to report what i saw
content.summary: One flew straight and very fast faster than the airplanes in the area and no flashing lights like the other the other one was still in the sky like a bright star and then disappeared and never reappeared and the sky is clear of clouds

content.detailedDescription:
The first occurrence of this sighting of an object/lights was recorded on our i-pad as it is motion censored and in fact we didn't see it personally but only through the videos which it recorded. on april 20th, 2016 my husband was asleep and something woke him at exactly 5:00am. he stated he had the feeling that someone was in the house. he turned on the lights and walked through several rooms, but there was nothing there. in fact the next morning he went on the roof of the house, but also found nothing. when i looked at our security camera (i-pad) we were in awe of what we saw at exactly 5:00am. there were 3 short videos of only a few seconds long. the first one at 5:00am then 5:08am and 5:18am. each occurrence showed this object to have moved a little further west. the first one was right over our barns, which is a few hundred feet from the house each time the object appears to just hover there. we live on a farm in northern saskatchewan and so we have never really believed in ufo's! we couldn't seem to find a logical explanation for this but didn't really know what to think or do. 
then on june 17th at 2:12am our camera again captured this similar object/lights closer to the house and a little to the south maybe only 100 feet or so from the house in front of our quonset. neither one of us were home this night. we have decided to put up additional cameras to try to find out more of what this could possibly be. we had thought this sighting on april 20th would be a one time thing. now we are a little concerned as to what this is.....
i will try to send a couple of photos, hopefully they will send.
content.summary: Never seen anything like this before, and it returned to be captured on video again june 17/2016

content.detailedDescription: I heard the rain hitting the window of my bedroom. i looked out the window and the storm was consistent with a hurricane plus the lightning was ongoing. i recorded the weather because if i tried to explain it to my husband, he wouldn't believe me. after i recorded for 37 seconds, i got back in bed and reviewed the video and noticed the red lights. well, i then zoomed in to see that appeared to be a craft of a sort. and decided to contact you.
content.summary: I was video taping the weather and noticed the red lights on my recording

content.detailedDescription: I have been setting a modified ghost-pro, night vision camera for a couple of months. it is on a tripod, pointed 90 degrees, straight-up, this happens to be in the virgo constellation at this time of year. this camera is 10-12 mps, hi-definition, with an 8x zoom, zoomed all the way, and has never given me results even near this sighting. i was outside at least 15-20 minutes during the filming, it was a spectacularly clear night, and remained that way all night, i saw nothing by naked eye. the battery on the camera lasts for about 2hrs, so this is not the full video, i have another 1hr of this sighting available. while i was reviewing the footage a couple days later, i saw blinking appear in the lower left area of the picture, slowly and randomly, the blinking appears, and by the end of this video are thousands of lights, some make shapes, lines, 2 & 3 'linked' lights, 'l'-shapes, squares, all colors, including a deep blue, there is also some kind of red and blue clouds, visible all over the screen, that appears to be associated with the blinking lights, also not visible by eyesight. i don't believe that these are 'artefacts' in the camera, there is movement of these lights even though the camera was stationary. when the blinking is most active, it almost looks like you imagine electricity moves through a circuit board. the video is un-retouched and has no audio because i wanted to present it exactly as i viewed. the camera does have a microphone, and didn't record any sound during this event. i would be happy to make the full video available, as well as the camera, for testing. could this be holographic technology, or a mass of craft, or is this a spiritual encounter, all outside of human vision? is the summer solstice part of the reason? thank you
content.summary: Thousands of lights blinking in ultraviolet

content.detailedDescription: Driving out of goldfield nv towards tonopah nv noticed cars pulled over on side of road. 1st thought was that it looked like a very big bi-plane. they way the lights were. so we slowed to watch. then i just disappeared. so we turned around and pulled over to see "wtf". thats when 1 light reappeared. then 1 light turned into 2 lights. then 2 turned to three. it seemed to enlongate and grow. then it just disappeared again. that was it.
content.summary: Appeared,. disappeared. reappeared. disappeared again

content.detailedDescription: Sat at home in my bedroom. out of my window (in 7 floors up in a tower block) i spotted something reasonably high up, but lower than aircraft. i initially thought it was a bit of cardboard lifted in the wind, due to its slightly odd shape. i kept my eye on it and realised it was a little weirder, seemingly spinning. second instinct was a large balloon. that is what i think it probably is as it made no especially sharp turns, but i don't know. it was odd enough for me to film on my iphone and submit here. i zoomed in to film, which may have caused some distortion on the footage. it just caught my eye and maybe if others saw it and caught it on camera it would back up those accounts. the object curved away into the distance, possibly simply moving with the wind. if only i had binoculars!
content.summary: Noticed odd "thing" out of my bedroom window. thought it was just cardboard lifted high in the wind. then saw it was spinning... filmed it.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving my son and niece to my parents house for the night, when we noticed 2 orange colored solid orbs that were quit on the larger side to the north east. as i was coming over the bridge it caught my attention as they were bright. i sped up to get over the bridge to the stop sign at the intersection of old coal mine road and clemets road.  when i first noticed it i didn't think it was a plane or anything else man made it was to odd of an object. right as i was getting ready to pull my phone out both of the orbs made a fast turn one after the other and then just disappeared. i want to stress that you could see the stars through the clouds that night. i thought at first maybe it just got lost in the clouds but when i saw that you could easily see the stars still even with the clouds i realized that this was not something you see everyday. i got the chills and goosebumps. my son who is 7 would not open his eyes after he saw 

i want to stress that even though they are witnesses they are young but if you ask both of them they will tell you exactly what happened
content.summary: Looked to ne saw 2 solid orbs one following the other one behind was off to right of the one in front the suddenly changed directions and boom they disappeared

content.detailedDescription: After fighting an 18 wheeler trailer fire some pictures that were taken were posted on face book in one photo an object was noted above the area where we were fighting fire it apears in the photo that i am attaching there were no aircraft here'd or seen in the area at the time and the object does not look like any aircraft i have ever worked with or seen hoping some one can tell me what it is
content.summary: Showed up in picture

content.detailedDescription:
June 14, 8:35 p.M.  my daughter and i were watching for the iss which was scheduled to pass over our area from the sw. my daughter pointed to an object coming over the hill behind our house that she thought was the iss. i told her that was the wrong direction. our local regional vocational school is located at the top of the hill. as i turned to look where she was pointing i observed a large, rectangular shape. its edges were glowing red.(not pulsating).  it appeared to me that there was a ridge at the center of the rectangle.  as it passed overhead it had two large round lights on the underside. when it was almost directly above us, one of the lights flashed brighter. at first i thought the object might be a solar panel attached to the iss because of its shape, but i believe it was too low in the sky to be the iss. my feelings were of wonder, puzzlement and then excitement at what we saw.  we lost sight of it as it continued on its straight, level path to the ne toward boston.
i don't know what we saw, but would like to know if anyone else saw or reported it  i tried unsuccessfully to contact out local tv station.
thank you.
content.summary: Large rectangular,red glowing edges, two large red lights on underside

content.detailedDescription:
I took pictures at sunset thursday, june 16 around 7:30-8:00pm on wrightsville beach, nc at the southern point of the island where the ocean meets the sound. the next day when i was posting them on facebook, i noticed a glowing green spot on the image, and enlarged it to see what it was. it appeared to be a translucent,glowing, green orb with dots,lights, or spines on the surface.
i then discovered another photo in a different location down the beach with a similar orb on the sand, and 3 more photos with similar, but more perfectly round objects in the sky. 
in the glare of the sunset, i did not actually see these objects when i took the photos. the photos are from my galaxy 6s edge phone, and are untouched outside of cropping to view the objects more closely. other photos taken at the same time do not have this green spot, so it is not something foreign on or in the camera.
since i only discovered the orbs in photos after i had left the area, i have no answers to questions 2-6.
content.summary: Green glowing orbs in photos at sunset. shown on the ground and in the sky.

content.detailedDescription: Approximately 9.30pm on june 21st 2016 saw an object in the sky that was moving. it was cigar shaped but looked like it was on fire but left no trail. it moved at the speed you would expect to see an aeroplane move when you look up to the sky. i thought it may be a comet or a shooting star or possibly some sort of reflection but i have done some research on all of the above and none move in the way this did. it's speed was constant and it flew out over the north sea. i videoed it then checked my phone to see it had recorded and when i looked back up, it had gone. i do not know whether it disappeared or simply went out of sight. whilst it was visible, i rang my neighbour and she also saw it.
content.summary: Moved across the sky but no trail left

content.detailedDescription:
While in jerusalem late sept 2015, we took lot's of photos with one having unknown/seen object in picture. picture taken seconds before has no object!
at first i thought it could be a bird. however, other than an occasional pigeon seen at and around human food sources we saw few birds flying anywhere around the country. we have several hundred pictures and only the ones near humans have birds. we also seen other things of the same nature while there but this is the only picture with an object we didn't notice or possibly see with the naked eye?
content.summary: Object found in picture, not noticed when took

content.detailedDescription:
I got home at 10:30 pm and noticed a glowing light to the north as i was walking into the house. at first i thought it was fireworks (or a flare) but quickly realized there was no noise and it was moving. it moved westward and then moved northeast away from me until i could barely see it. this all took maybe a minute. it did not move abruptly but smooth and sometimes seemed like it was fluttering up or down. at first glance it was very bright so it caught my attention. then it was as if it noticed i was looking and immediately moved west and then northeast gaining altitude slightly. i kept watching it to see if i could make some sense of it and i could identify it but there was no logic to it.
i'm 60 years old and grew up a mile from the st. louis airport and still live in flight paths so i am very familiar with the night sky and what are aircraft lights etc. this was nothing like i have ever seen.
i went in the house and told my wife. we both went out to look some more but it was gone.
content.summary: Glowing fire, fluttering, no noise, moved away once i started to watch it

content.detailedDescription: I was watching tv when i noticed the object outside on the patio at approximately 9pm. the object looked to be about the size of a soccer ball, neon green/yellow. a solid glowing sphere. it was floating and just hovered for a couple seconds then went east. i thought it was a drone or kids toy or something. i felt indifferent.
content.summary: A neon green/yellow sphere seen floating

content.detailedDescription: Was in the car with my friend on my way from banff alberta on my way to calgary, i took a pic of the last chunk of hills before the land flattened out and didnt see anything in the moment, until 2 days later i was looking through my photos and realized there was a ufo or something round shaped object in the sky where there was no clouds,couldn't have been a cloud or a drone or a plane because i dont know of any round shaped airplane and it size compared to the hill beside it doesnt make sense. you have to zoom in to see the ufo
content.summary: Realized i took a picture of a ufo or its thats what it is i witnessed on my way back from the rockies

content.detailedDescription: Sitting at my computer, noticed strange light out back window. took a phito of light sitting stationary and decoded to video. when i begqn videoing, the light slowing move out of site. when i went for closer look, no trqce was found
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Light sat in line of sight, then slowly movd out oglf line f sight

content.detailedDescription: Sitting at my computer, saw a strange light out back window from my seat. i took a photo, qnd then decided to video it. as i pressed record light slpwly moved out of vision, as i got up and tried to look for it, nothing was there.
content.summary: Light hovered, then moved out of sight, slowly

content.detailedDescription: Spotted a starlime object, orgonally thought was a shooting star, watched for a few seconds then grabbed phone and recorded it until it faded out of existence
content.summary: Starlike object travello gnat rather fast speed

content.detailedDescription: My family and i were having a bon fire while playing 21 questions. then, my dad looks and i look up and we see these zig-zagging lights. this was obvisously not a plane or helicopter! my dad has experienced that before on holloween. 30-60 minutes later the lights seemed to be stationary. when they came there were over 10 little dots following the brighter dots doing the same zig-zag movement. they all ended up doing a triangle formation poiting torwards the massive cloud they came from. then to finalize, one bright light zooms past the sky and a shooting star passes it.... whats the chance of that!!! we were all stunned. i had chills all the way through that. the object zoomed past the sky so fast is was so strange. we lost sight when it flew over the trees in my backyard
content.summary: There were tons of little dots of lights zig-zagging torwards the north! it scared me and my family! i want to know if these were real extra terrestrial action or real military testing/drone.

content.detailedDescription:
I video record all my flights.  i had fueled and was going through my pre-flight checklist.  on video playback, i saw this unexplained streak of light.  it seemed too slow to be a "shooting star", plus it was in the daylight.   the video is facing the sun, so it shouldn't be a reflection.  i assumed this might be space junk burning up on re-entry, but frame by frame shows only a white ball, with no trail or smoke.  there were no iridium flares locally at that time.  i did not witness this live, only on playback from my gopro.  

this was filmed at our airport.  geographic coordinates are 50 degrees 01' 11.43" n, 110 degrees 43' 34.59" w.  our airport has an elevation of 2351 feet above see level.  the video is aimed at approximately 318 degrees true/ 330 degress magnetic.  i see a white streak in the sky, approximately 30-35 degrees above the horizon.   in the video it passes from right to left (north to south), until it's lost under the top wing.   i can't tell if it is rising, or simply passing from north to south.

in the video attached, it occurs around the 9 second mark.  i'm not saying it's a real ufo, but i certainly can't explain this.

i do have a full length digital video saved, but it is only seen in this short clip.
content.summary: Incidental unexplained observation on video playback

content.detailedDescription: Near my home here in chattanooga tennessee there is vast expanse of land that was once used to manufacture military weapons and explosives. it is known by locals here as the tnt plant. the area was always fenced off until a few years ago when a road was opened up that went right through the middle of it. though the road is still separated from the rest of the land which is covered with unusual looking bunker type structures and old train tracks. trains still sit there at times and though it is supposed to be inactive i have witnessed things that would make one think otherwise. there is a dried out pond off the road with a bunker in the center of it. once when driving past i witnessed a man standing by it in a radioactive suit. my cousin is big into photography and had stopped out there one time to take pictures of the trains. he was quickly approached by a man telling him the place was off limits and that there were high levels of radiation. none of this would seem too unusual except maybe to say that the place is definitely still in use. well one night i drove through there and had my first and only ufo experience. near the trains there is an old water tower. directly above it maybe 80 feet up the ufo was hovering at a slight angle. i could only see the underside of it. it was triangular in shape. there was a light in each corner. it lowered until i couldn't see it anymore because of the trees and trains. i drove on and to this day everyone is skeptical of what i had seen. except for my friend that was with me. well that is my story. thanks for listening. i still drive through there quite frequently, but haven't seen anything since.
content.summary: Black triangle hovering over tnt ammunitions plant
